uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.manage

Class CManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.manage.CManager

  • public class CManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Point-of-entry for applications using a pure frames-based MEKON model.

    Optionally, the configuration information for the model section(s) can be provided via the general MEKON configuration system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void configureBuilder(CBuilder builder, KConfigFile configFile)
      Configures previously created model-builder to build model with the specification of the model section(s) coming from the specified configuration file.
      static CBuilder createBuilder()
      Creates model-builder to build model for which the specification of the model section(s) will come from a configuration file with the standard MEKON configuration file-name located somewhere on the classpath.
      static CBuilder createBuilder(KConfigFile configFile)
      Creates model-builder to build model for which the specification of the model section(s) will come from the specified configuration file.
      static CBuilder createEmptyBuilder()
      Creates model-builder to build model for which the specification of the model section(s) must be provided via the relevant methods.
      static CBuilder getBuilder(CModel model)
      Retrieves the model-builder for the specified model.

      • createBuilder

        public static CBuilder createBuilder()
        Creates model-builder to build model for which the specification of the model section(s) will come from a configuration file with the standard MEKON configuration file-name located somewhere on the classpath.
        Returns:
        Resulting model-builder
        Throws:
        KSystemConfigException - if configuration file does not exist
        XDocumentException - if configuration file does not contain correctly specified configuration information

      • createBuilder

        Creates model-builder to build model for which the specification of the model section(s) will come from the specified configuration file.
        Parameters:
        configFile - Relevant configuration file
        Returns:
        Resulting model-builder
        Throws:

        public static void configureBuilder(CBuilder builder,
                                    KConfigFile configFile)
        Configures previously created model-builder to build model with the specification of the model section(s) coming from the specified configuration file.
        Parameters:
        builder - Relevant model-builder
        configFile - Relevant configuration file
        Throws:
        KSystemConfigException - if configuration file does not exist
        XDocumentException - if configuration file does not contain correctly specified configuration information
